IX.iii.1.D.6.h
.
Handling the Loss of a Spouse With Income Resulting in an Increased Rate
Stop counting the dependent’s income when the dependent is lost.
If the loss of the dependent and the dependent’s income result in an increased rate of DIC becoming payable, make the actual adjustment the first day of the month that follows the date of the event per
38 CFR 3.31
.
